content:
That's great! It's always exciting to explore a new city and discover new food spots. I'd be happy to help you with some recommendations!

However, I have to clarify that I'm a large language model, I don't have personal experiences or know your location. Could you please tell me which city you're planning to visit? That way, I can provide you with some personalized recommendations on restaurants and cafes to check out.

Also, feel free to share the tips you got from the couple you met at the concert! Local insider knowledge is always valuable, and it might give me a better idea of what you're looking for in a dining experience.
